alert.note: Alert for Inland Palm Beach County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 16 at 6:18PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Palm Beach County through 700 PM EDT... At 618 PM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles northeast of Canal Point to 8 miles east of Belle Glade. Movement was west at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Belle Glade, Pahokee, South Bay, Canal Point, Belle Glade Camp and Fremd Village-Padgett Island. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes.
